Subject: New problem
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Up over what will be known as the Grand Canyon, a buzzing noise emits. As
it gets louder, a flaming object hits the ground creating a huge impact. As
the smoke clears from the crater, a red hot stasis pod begins to cool down,
ready for somone to find it.
